description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Job Summary:
              
              You will be working under the direction of the Sales Managers, responsible for the assigned area or function, to perform the following duties:
              

              Job duties and Responsibilities:
              
              -	Responsible for assigned area Sales (Trade or Channel), Industrial B2B distribution ... etc.
              
              -	Working with and support the sales and marketing team in achieving agreed margin and revenue grow.
              
              -	Collect, analyze & updates of market data into useful competitive information for management decision.
              
              -	Identify and develop new customers, accounts, trades for sustainable growth.
              
              -	Work together with respective Department Heads for sale & marketing idea, concepts, new products rollouts... etc.
              
              -	Performs other miscellaneous duties as assigned.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Minimum a diploma / Degree and minimum 5 years sales and marketing experience in FMCG, Stationery or industrial B2B industries background
              
              -	Prior working knowledge in FMCG, Paper, Printing, Ink, converter, Packaging, Stationery or related industries is a plus.
              
              -	Exposures to distribution management, Trade or Channel sales, or Technical sales are advantages.
              
              -	Work independently with minimum supervision.
              
              -	Good communication, presentation skills & excellent Customer focus.
              
              -	Resourceful & Result oriented
              

              Interested candidate kindly apply on line. Only shortlisted candidates will be notify.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
